tool_description:
Send gift cards through a single, simple REST API. Access thousands of local and national merchants (USA) through our Gifting Platform. From customer love to internal employee rewards, developers are using the API to create solutions that could only be accomplished before by physically buying and shipping plastic gift cards.  Gifts can be tied to a specific location, perfect for converting online engagement to in-store traffic via measurable marketing campaigns.
We are always looking for new use cases and case studies to feature so if you have any questions, comments, or general feedback drop us a line at developers@yiftee.com!

*This API points to our sandbox server and no real gifts will be issues*
name: Yiftee-sandbox
title: Yiftee-sandbox

api_list.name: National Brands
api_list.description: Returns all national brands in our database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yiftee.p.rapidapi.com/merchants/national_brands"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yiftee.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yiftee.p.rapidapi.com/merchants/national_brands"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Online Merchants
api_list.description: Get a list of merchants who can accept Yiftee gifts online

api_list.name: Merchant by lat/lon
api_list.description: Searches for merchants near specified lat/lon

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number of results to return; default=20

api_list.name: Merchant by zipcode
api_list.description: Searches for merchants in the specified zipcode

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number of results to return; default=20

api_list.name: Merchant by city and state
api_list.description: Searches for Merchants in specified city and state

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number of results to return; default=20

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: URL encoded array of merchant IDs
